items.title: Primary diagnosis and staging
items.summary: Initial workup confirmed lymphoma; staging and baseline tests completed.
items.details: Symptoms led to hematology consult. Imaging and biopsies established the diagnosis and stage. Baseline echo and labs recorded before treatment.

items.title: R‑CHOP (6 cycles)
items.summary: Standard-line chemotherapy completed with supportive care.
items.details: Six cycles administered every 21 days with growth‑factor support. Interim imaging showed partial response; end‑of‑treatment scan documented best response.

items.title: Cell therapy and inpatient recovery
items.summary: Cell infusion with monitored hospital stay; complications managed.
items.details: Received cell therapy under protocol with neuro/cardiac monitoring. Complications included fever and weakness; stabilized and discharged to rehab.

items.title: Oral multi‑agent chemotherapy (14 doses)
items.summary: Current course: complex oral regimen taken at home, total of 14 doses.
items.details: Adam is on a structured per‑oral chemotherapy consisting of multiple components. The plan includes 14 doses with careful monitoring of tolerance and interim labs.

items.title: Second‑opinion board & treatment decision
items.summary: Multidisciplinary review to confirm options and timing.
items.details: Case to be presented to a board (hematology/oncology/rehab). Decision may include watchful waiting, targeted therapy, or enrollment in a program. Timing depends on diagnostics and logistics.

items.title: Support and recovery program
items.summary: Structured support and functional recovery after the current course.
items.details: If indicated after evaluation, a block of supportive care and rehabilitation will follow (scope and venue to be refined).

items.title: Extended rehabilitation program
items.summary: If indicated, longer rehab block with daily routine.
items.details: May proceed only if resources and clinical status permit. Scope and schedule remain uncertain.

changelog.note: Updated: removed locations; set current to oral multi‑agent chemo (14 doses); moved support & recovery to plans.
